item.description:
Members signed up for this trip, please check your email! This information below is very important!

Hi All,

Unfortunately there's a problem beyond our control with the boat for this Saturday's trip to Star Island. It's completely out of our hands. As such we've been scrambling to find other options for us. I'm sorry for the last minute change, we just don't have any control over the boat companies/captains. Dianne has put a lot of effort and time into arranging this trip. We're working to keep the day/experience as similar as possible to the original. 

Luckily we have managed to find a trip that is pretty similar.  PLEASE NOTE: The departure location/time changes!

Here's what we can do for Plan B:
There's another boat company that can accommodate our groups. We'd meet in  PORTSMOUTHinstead of Rye. The new itinerary would be:

  • 10:00 AM - Arrive  Portsmouth (  you MUST be at the dock NO LATER THAN 10:15a.m. )
  • 10:25 AM - Boarding starts 
  • 10:55 AM - Depart Portsmouth for Star Island
  • 11:55 AM (Approx) - Arrive at Star Island
  • 4:15 PM (Approx) - Board to leave Star Island
  • 5:45 PM - Arrive in Portsmouth


**** We need to bring a packed lunch. Lunch is NOT available on the island. Please visit the website below for parking information.

http://www.islesofsho...



What you need to know:
The cost for this new option is $40 which includes the Island Fee. CAPE Group members will be refunded $7 each on Saturday. ($50 paid, - $40 for new boat option, - Paypal Fee) 


What we need from you:
We must receive an email response from each of you giving the okay to switch your money over to the new company.  

If you prefer to just have your money refunded and opt out of the trip, I need to know ASAP. We need to reserve spots on the new boat right away. If there are a lot of cancelations/lack of interest in this new option--We'll have to cancel the trip.

Thanks for being timely with this, sorry for the rush! We very much appreciate your patience and help. This can still be a great trip and day!


CAPE Group Organizers/Seacoast Co-Organizers, Beth and Dianne


P.S. A special thanks to Dianne! She's put much time into trying to make this event happen, in addition to it being a wonderful and unique experience.

 

 

 

 

Day trip to Star Island in the Isle of Shoals off the coast of Portsmouth NH.

  We'll head out in the morning for shooting until noon and lunch.  After lunch, we'll shoot a little more then board the boat for the trip back which passes a lighthouse on the way.  We're looking forward to a wonderful day in what's been said to be a magical place!

 

ITINERARY -  ***IMPORTANT*** - CHANGES HAVE BEEN MADE TO THIS ITINERARY

  •  10:00 AM - Arrive Portsmouth ( you MUST be at the dock NO LATER THAN 10:15a.m. )
  •  10:25 AM - Boarding starts 
  •  10:55 AM - Depart Portsmouth for Star Island
  •  11:55 AM (Approx) - Arrive at Star Island
  •  4:15 PM (Approx) - Board to leave Star Island
  •  5:45 PM - Arrive in Portsmouth

 

ABOUT THE ISLAND

Star Island is located ten miles off the coast of New Hampshire. It is the second largest of the nine islands that make up the Isles of Shoals and its historic Oceanic House and adjacent buildings become the village home for thousands of visitors each summer.

The nonprofit Star Island Corporation has owned and operated Star Island since 1916, providing affordable individual and family retreats. From June to September guests come for a day, an overnight visit or to attend one of the many conferences presented each summer on a range of subjects such as natural history, writing, photography, music, painting, ecology, matters of the spirit, yoga and more.

 

LIMITS

Our reservation is currently set up for 10.  The boat holds 20.  The limit for this event is set for 10 but I've also set up a waiting list.   If I see that the numbers are going beyond 10, I'll call to see if we can increase our reservation.  

 

FEES:

 

IMPORTANT NOTE::: Fees for this trip will be collected upon signing up for the event, payable with credit card via Paypal.   All fees are non-refundable. If you sign up, pay and then find you cannot attend, you will be responsible for filling your spot or forfeit your payment.  You can check the waitlist to see if there are any folks waiting for a spot.   Please contact them directly via their Meetup profile.   Please do not contact the organizers to fill your spot .

 

DEADLINE:

Cutoff for signing up is Tuesday, July 26 at 11:00 PM .  I have to have guarantees in to the cruise company by the next day.  If you're trying to sign up after that date and time, please shoot me an email to find out about availability.  I can't guarantee I can get you on the boat after that date/time but I'm willing to try.

 

ADDITIONAL INFO:

Star Island Info for Day Guests: http://starisland.org/visiting/day-guests/

Isle of Shoals Steamship: http://www.islesofshoals.com/cart/index.php?event_id=4642

 

From the South:

I-95 North to Exit 7 (Market Street).  Take a right off the ramp and our port is a half a mile down the street on the left across from the Sheraton Harborside Hotel.

Proceed East on Route 16 until arriving at the I-95/Route 1 split.
Bear left towards the Portsmouth Traffic Circle.  Once at the traffic circle take the route 95 North exit heading towards Maine.  Take Route 95 North to exit 7 (Market Street).  Take a right off the ramp and our port is a half a mile down the street on the left across from the Sheraton Harborside Hotel.

From the North: 
I-95 South to NH Exit 7. LEFT at lights.  Drive 1/2 mile down Market Street and a port is on the left across from the Sheraton Harborside Hotel

Limited convenient dockside parking available at our dock for $5.00 per car.

 

 

CONTACT

Please contact Dianne via email if you have any questions about this event.   As the event gets closer, please keep an eye on your email for any announcements or additional information we may send out.
item.name: Day Trip to Isle of Shoals & Star Island
